Join us at 3DLOOK , where innovation meets creativity, as we seek a talented Research Engineer to collaborate with our Core Team. Embark on a journey of maintaining, exploring, and refining our body reconstruction pipeline, delving into the intricate world of 3D machine learning.



About us:



3DLOOK is a leading AI-powered technology company, specializing in mobile body scanning and visualization for a diverse set of industries. Certified by IEEE as a standard in mobile body scanning and earned recognition through multiple awards, such as the Digiday Technology Award and RTIH Innovation Award in 2021.



Are you ready to immerse yourself in the realm of cutting-edge technology? Here's what we're seeking:



Requirements:



- With over 5 years of hands-on experience nurturing CV/ML projects from conception to fruition, you'll be our guiding force.
- Your mastery of 3D computer vision and computational geometry is indispensable, a beacon illuminating our path forward.
- A profound understanding of the mathematical underpinnings of machine learning and numerical optimization is paramount.
- Navigate the labyrinth of data structures, data modeling, and software architecture with finesse.
- Craft intricate validation schemes, unraveling the mysteries of machine learning accuracy.
- Your technical prowess shines with Python, PyTorch/Tensorflow and an arsenal of numerical and scientific packages.

- Upper-intermediate proficiency in English empowers seamless communication across borders.
- Flexibility and stellar communication skills define your essence, embodying the spirit of a collaborative team player.

- Forge ahead with the development of our body reconstruction pipeline, infusing it with novel features and conducting groundbreaking research to elevate accuracy.

- Embark on projects that illuminate the path to enhanced accuracy, investing resources where they matter most.
- Safeguard the integrity of our ML pipeline testing flow, ensuring the fidelity of the data in use.



What we offer:



- The opportunity to join a team of professionals and bring your most creative ideas to life.
- Participation in the Stock Option Program is granted after 6 months of work in the company, in case of exceptional results.
- You will be entitled to 4 weeks (20 working days) of paid vacation in a year.
- Paid sick leaves (10 days/year with full coverage);
- Flexible working hours;
- Fully remote working environment.



At 3DLOOK , we don't just envision the future, we shape it. If you're ready to redefine boundaries and chart new territories in the realm of 3D ML engineering, we invite you to join us on this exhilarating expedition.
